trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest" /> class defines the message digest of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest" /> define o resumo da mensagem de uma mensagem CMS/PKCS #7.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the corresponding signer is not empty.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> objeto será automaticamente gerado e colocado no <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade sempre que o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para o assinante correspondente não está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object from which to copy information.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> do qual copiar as informações.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> objeto com especificado <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest.MessageDigest" /> property retrieves the message digest.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest.MessageDigest" /> recupera o resumo da mensagem.

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that contains the message digest.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de valores de bytes que contém o resumo da mensagem.
